title: sqlstate[42000] [1226] owncloud(db) has exceeded the 'max_queries_per_hour'
body:
### expected behaviour

upgrade windows client from 1.3.0 to 1.4.2 and syncing should work.

### actual behaviour

after upgrading windows client to 1.4.2 version i can not use owncloud any more. problem is that client use to much queries per hour. my limit is 50000 queries per hour which is enough for webpages and all other things on server. 

error in owncloud log:

fatal	 core	 sqlstate[42000] [1226] user 'ownclouddb' has exceeded the 'max_queries_per_hour' resource (current value: 50000)	 2013-11-27t07:45:36+00:00

### steps to reproduce
1. uninstall windows client 1.3.0
2. install windows client 1.4.2

### server configuration
operating system: linux

web server: 

database: mysql v.5

php version: version 5.2.42

owncloud version: 5.0.13

### client configuration
browser: chrome 31.0.1650.57 m

operating system: windows 7 professional

### logs
#### web server error log
```
```

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
{"app":"core","message":"sqlstate[42000] [1226] user 'ownclouddb' has exceeded the 'max_queries_per_hour' resource (current value: 50000)","level":4,"time":"2013-11-27t07:42:40+00:00"}
{"app":"core","message":"sqlstate[42000] [1226] user 'ownclouddb' has exceeded the 'max_queries_per_hour' resource (current value: 50000)","level":4,"time":"2013-11-27t07:42:40+00:00"}
```

#### browser log
```

a) the javascript console log
b) the network log 
c) ...
```
